Yvy wishes to purchase more ingredients in order to increase production and improve her profits. She will be able to satisfy client demand. To this end she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles.  This loan will let her reach her goal.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients.

loans.name: Zoila Dolores

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo encontramos la ciudadela San Gregorio lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal San Gregorio.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Zoila. Tiene 49 años de edad, está divorciada pero de esta relación tuvo 4 hijos, tres de ellos ya mayores, la menor va a cumplir 18 años y estudia el último año de colegio y es la única que vive en su casa.

Ella trabaja en el Ministerio de salud pública pero también vende productos de Avon y Esika (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas). Además  vende zapatos de la marca Rey y sabanas, trabaja todos los días y a toda hora ya que también vende sus productos donde ella trabaja, deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, dice que le encanta vender. Su mercadería la compra en Quito y Guayaquil.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: zapatos, sábanas, perfumes, cremas, etc. Está en el Banco Comunal  desde el inicio hace 6 años y hasta este ciclo que acabo de terminar fue la presidenta. Sus metas son tener un carro nuevo.
texts.en:
In the outskirts of Portoviejo there is a village named San Gregorio where every two weeks the members of the community bank of San Gregorio meet.

Here we meet Zoila. She is 49 years old, she is divorced but from that relationship she had 4 children. Three of them are independent, and the youngest will be 18 years old and she is in her final year of college. She is the only one that still lives at home.

She works in the Ministry of Public Health but in addition she also sells Avon and Esika brand products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She also sells shoes of the Rey and Sabanas brand name. She works every day and she also sells her products where works. She completes her sales on credit, collecting every 8 days. She says she loves sales. She acquires her merchandise in Quito and Guayaquil.

This loan will be used to purchase more merchandise, such as: shoes, bedding, perfumes, skin creams, etc. She has been a member of her community bank since its inception 6 years ago and up to now she has been the leader of the group. Her goal is to purchase a new car.

loans.use: To purchase shoes, bedding, perfumes, and skin creams, etc.

loans.name: Segundo Gregorio

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 43 años D. edad, es casado y resiD. junto a su esposa y a su hijo en el distrito D. Manuel Mesones Muro, una zona agrícoL. situada en L. provincia D. Ferreñafe, a más D. media hora D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en L. crianza y venta D. animales. El cría animales menores en diversos corrales situados en L. parte posterior D. su domicilio. Cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes D. L. zona y al público en general. 

Adicionalmente se encarga D. brindar servicio D. transporte D. carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado que consiste en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para realizar actividades D. transporte). El ya lleva trabajando en estas actividades por cinco años y se vale D. ellas para sacar adelante L. economía D. su familia.

Segundo desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar L. crianza D. sus animales, así como para realizar algunas mejoras en sus corrales. Con esta inversión el espera que sus animales se desarrollen D. mejor modo y pueda obtener mejores ingresos D. sus ventas. Para lograr su objetivo el se ha visto en L. necesidad D. solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Segundo is 43 years old, he is married and he lives together with his wife and their son in the district of Manuel Mesones Muro. It is an agricultural region in the province of Ferrenafe and it is located more than half an hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

He is a farmer who raises and sells livestock. He raises his livestock in several corrals located in the back portion of his property. When the livestock have reached a certain level of development he sells them to the merchants in the region and to the general public. 

In addition he also provides transportation services for both cargo and passengers with the use of a motorcycle rickshaw (a motorized vehicle consisting of a motorcycle and a cabin that is used for transportation). He has had his businesses for five years and he depends on them to proviD. for his family. 

Segundo wishes to purchase balanced feed to improve the quality of his livestock and he also needs to carry out some improvements to the corrals. With this investment he expects to see his livestock develop in a healthy way and he will see an improvement in his earnings. In order to meet his objective he has approached Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: To purchase balanced feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en:
Florida T. is from the village of Goleo.  She is 59 years old.  Florida is married and has two children who are also married.  To make a living, Florida operates a business selling electronics in the local community.  The main source of income for the business comes from her honorarium as a Barangay Treasurer in Goleo. 

Florida has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 3,500 PHP a month from these activities.  In 2008, Florida joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  Florida is requesting a new loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase additional inventory and provide working capital.  This will be her third loan from PMPC.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to financially support immediate family members.

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao.  It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory and provide working capital

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: El señor Juan José Sáenz V. hace 11 años se dedica al transporte escolar, esta es la manera que el percibe un ingreso para abastecer los gastos de su familia. El camión donde trabaja y traslada al estudiante esta fallando del motor es por ello que el pide el apoyo para comprar un nuevo y no exponer a la niños que traslada a un accidente. Pedro quiere dar un mejor servicio y así poder tener más ingresos para ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Juan Jose S. V. has been a school bus driver for 11 years. This is how he is able to earn an income to meet his family's expenses. The engine on the bus he uses to work is failing and for this reason is requesting support. He needs to purchase a new engine, to keep the children from any possible accident. He wants to provide his clients with a better level of services and to see an improvement in his earnings, with the goal of providing with his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To carry out maintenance repairs to his van.

loans.name: Mercedes Fidelina

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo encontramos la ciudadela San Gregorio lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal San Gregorio.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Mercedes. Tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta  relación tiene dos  hijas de 7 y un año, la mayor esta en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en petrocomercial. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque  los créditos son rápidos sin tantos requisitos, es la actual presidenta del Banco.
 
Es una muy buena ama de casa que además se dedica a la venta de ropa interior de damas  por catalogo de la marca Leonisa, trabaja todos los días desde las 8h30 hasta las 17h00 ya que la mayoría de las ventas las realiza en su casa, hasta donde llegan sus clientes a comprar sus productos los mismos que deja a crédito y cobra semanalmente. Su mercadería la recibe en una distribuidora en Portoviejo.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar ropa interior de damas ya que tiene varios encargos. Sus sueños son terminar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
In the outskirts of Portoviejo there is a village named San Gregorio where every two weeks the members of the community bank of San Gregorio meet.

Here we meet Mercedes. She is 28 years old, she is married and she has 2 daughters from this relationship, aged 7 and 1. The eldest attends school. Her husband works in a gas station. She is a founding member of the community bank. She enjoys being a member for the ease and timeliness of the loans granted. She is currently the leader of the bank.

She is a good house wife but in addition she also sells ladies' undergarments through a catalogue of the Leonisa brand name. She works every day from 8:30am to 5pm and she carries out most of her sales from her home.  Clients come to her to purchase products. She completes her sales on credit and she collects weekly payments.  She receives her merchandise from a distributor in Portoviejo. 

This loan will be used to purchase ladies' undergarments in order to fill some outstanding orders. Her dream is to finish her university training.

loans.use: To purchase ladies' undergarments for resale.

loans.name: Homero

texts.es:
Homero C. trabaja en un rancho cerca de la ciudad la mayor parte de la semana y su esposa en casa para el cuidado de la casa.
En este momento no cuenta con todo el capital para impermeabilizar su vivienda y mantenimiento de las paredes exteriores dañadas, este proyecto lo quiere arreglar antes de que empiece la  temporada de lluvia y se trasmine el agua y sea mayor el problema.
texts.en: Homero C. works on a farm near the city for the greater part of the week and his wife stays at home to take care of the housework. At this time he does not have the capital funds to weather-proof their house and to repair the damaged exterior walls. He wants to complete these projects before the rainy season in order to prevent the major problem of water from seeping through.

loans.use: To weather-proof their house and to repair the damaged exterior walls.
